title: Exit
creator_credit: Dennis Meltzer, Aranda Films and Bruce McNaughton
brief_description: A drama about a group of people stranded at an old wartime guesthouse during a flood. One guest announces that he has the power to “decreate” people and is asked to demonstrate. From an original story by Harry Farjeon. Cast includes: Mark Albiston, Stewart Faichney, Tom Lake, Dina Mann, Brian Moll, John Russell and Sandra Wright.
